name: The Minims
summary:
The Minims - A New Beginning is an adventure game in the vein of point and click games, about a personal journey of an endearing creature of the Minim species.

On yet another beautiful day, on the top of the rock, Mii is doing some chores, when it dawns on him that Mo appears to be missing.

In the game, the player must use logic, collect important items, and solve puzzles in order to guide Mii in his search to find his life partner Mo. Tracing her steps he embarks on a journey which becomes a self-seeking exploration regarding life choices and personal values.
